MS-CMRSeg 2019: Multi-sequence Cardiac MR Segmentation Challenge
in conjunction with STACOM and MICCAI 2019（Aug 13th, 2019, Shenzhen, China）
Participate procedure
1.Read carefully the Terms and Conditions and return the signed Data Use agreement document.
2.We’ll get in touch and then send you back the data link.
3.Send us or submit by a platform your final results (in nii.gz format) from the validation data set.
4.Submit your paper follow the LNCS style according to the main MICCAI conference guidelines.
Important data
Submission deadline: June 12th, 2019
Notification of acceptance: July 3th, 2019
Workshop Camera ready: July 17th, 2019
Workshop Date: (TBA) Oct 13 or 14th, 2019, Shenzhen, China
Review process
or the submitted manuscripts, they will be firstly reviewed by the workshop organizers who willensure the quality of the paper reached the publication standard. Then each paper will be reviewed by our reviewers. The review procedure will be double-blinded, similar to the MICCAI submissions. Review comments will be sent to the authors for their further consideration of modifications and preparation for the final camera ready copy that will be included in the workshop proceedings.
References
Please cite the following papers when you use the data for publications:
[1] Xiahai Zhuang: Multivariate mixture model for myocardial segmentation combining multi-sourceimages. IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (T PAMI), doi: 10.1109/TPAMI.2018.2869576.
[2] Xiahai Zhuang: Multivariate mixture model for cardiac segmentation from multi-sequenceMRI. International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer-Assisted Intervention, pp.581-588, 2016.
Organizers
Xiahai Zhuang, School of Data Science, Fudan University, Shanghai China.
Lei Li, School of Biomedical engineering, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, China.
